attributes.action: Make the 14th of march Stephen hawking day
attributes.background: Stephen hawking was an inspirational figure  and renowned around the world. Even whilst suffering from motor neurone disease he continued his work and made ground breaking discoveries. So we propose that the 14th of march be a day to remember a great man, an inspiration to us all.

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Stephen Hawking Day" - for example, whether you would like a new public holiday to be created or not.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
